home.title: Recall.bio
home.subtitle: Document your life through daily responses. Reflect, learn, and preserve your voice for yourself and the people you choose.

hero.title: Your Life, Your Voice, Your Legacy
hero.subtitle: Each day, a question that invites reflection. Document your story in your own voice and build a treasure of wisdom and memories.

problem.title: Life Moves Fast
problem.description: Important moments, meaningful conversations, and the lessons that define who you are fade over time. Without documenting them, those stories slip away.
problem.point3: Your voice gets lost in time

solution.title: Preserve Your Story, One Day at a Time
solution.description: Recall.bio helps you document your life in a simple and meaningful way. Each day, answer a thoughtful question and build an emotional archive that you and the people you choose will treasure forever.

feature1.title: Daily Questions
feature1.description: Receive a unique question each day designed to inspire reflection and connection with yourself.

feature2.title: Audio & Text
feature2.description: Document your memories in text or record your voice to preserve emotion, tone, and your unique way of expressing yourself.

feature3.title: Share Your Legacy
feature3.description: Choose who to share your memories with. You decide when and with whom to share your story.

feature4.title: Complete Privacy
feature4.description: Your memories are encrypted and only you control who has access.

step1.title: Sign Up Free
step1.description: Create your account in less than a minute. No credit card required.

step2.title: Answer Daily
step2.description: Each day you receive a unique question. Take a few minutes to reflect and respond.

step3.title: Build Your Archive
step3.description: Over time, your responses become a complete archive of your life, thoughts, and wisdom.

step4.title: Share When You Want
step4.description: Choose who to share your legacy with. You can activate access whenever you decide.

testimonial1.quote: Recall.bio has helped me document moments I never wanted to forget. It's like having a personal journal that my children will be able to read someday.
testimonial1.author: Maria G.

testimonial2.quote: The best part is that I can record my voice. When my grandchildren hear my stories, they'll hear my real voice, not just words on a page.
testimonial2.author: Carlos R.

testimonial3.quote: Receiving my father's digital legacy was incredibly emotional. His words and voice helped me feel closer to him and better understand his story.
testimonial3.author: Ana L.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Your privacy is our priority. All data is encrypted and only you control who has access to your memories.
faq.a2: Export functionality is coming soon! You'll be able to export all your memories in JSON or PDF format.
faq.q3: What if I forget to answer one day?
faq.a3: No problem. You can answer previous questions at any time or simply continue with today's question.
faq.q4: How do I share my legacy?
faq.a4: You can designate one or more trusted people at any time. You can activate access immediately or schedule it for the future.
faq.a5: Recall.bio is completely free. We believe preserving your legacy shouldn't have a cost.
